bibl.note: Genesis and Plato's Timaeus on creation. - Changes in Genesis 1-3 LXX relating to sexuality. - Genesis 2:18-25. - Genesis 3:16-19 and 3:13. - The Timaeus and Genesis 1-3 LXX on human sexuality. - Conclusion. - Pp. 228-232, Appendix: The LXX and Ptolemy II.
